bugphyzz 0.0.1.3
  • Get started
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Curation Checks
    • Descriptive statistcs of taxa annotations
    • Write physiology sets

    Fetch physiological data

    physiologies.Rd

    Fetch physiological data

    physiologies(keyword = "all")

    Arguments

    keyword

    a character vector of physiologies desired (see curationLinks). For the available physiologies, run bugphyzz::physiologiesList()

    Value

    a large list of data.frames

    Examples

    x <- physiologies()
#> Finished animal pathogen
#> Finished antimicrobial resistance
#> Dropped 3054 rows with missing Attribute_value from antimicrobial sensitivity
#> Finished biofilm forming
#> Dropped 4 rows with missing Attribute_value from butyrate producing
#> Finished acetate producing
#> Finished lactate producing
#> Finished arrangement
#> Dropped 9304 rows with missing Attribute_value from shape
#> Finished COGEM pathogenicity rating
#> Finished mutation rate per site per generation
#> Finished mutation rates per site per year
#> Finished extreme environment
#> Finished gram stain
#> Finished growth medium
#> Finished growth temperature
#> Finished habitat
#> Finished optimal ph
#> Finished aerophilicity
#> Finished plant pathogenicity
#> Finished width
#> Finished spore shape
#> Finished isolation site
#> Finished disease association
#> Finished hydrogen gas producing
#> Finished length
#> Finished health associated
head(x[[1]])
#>   NCBI_ID Genome_ID Accession_ID                         Taxon_name
#> 1  244596        NA           NA              Hoeflea phototrophica
#> 2   53633        NA           NA          Sulfobacillus acidophilus
#> 3   53635        NA           NA        Acidimicrobium ferrooxidans
#> 4   50339        NA           NA             Thermoplasma volcanium
#> 5   28034        NA           NA Sulfobacillus thermosulfidooxidans
#> 6  405212        NA           NA    Alicyclobacillus acidocaldarius

#> 1 animal pathogen           FALSE The Microbe Directory       NA
#> 2 animal pathogen           FALSE The Microbe Directory       NA
#> 3 animal pathogen           FALSE The Microbe Directory       NA
#> 4 animal pathogen           FALSE The Microbe Directory       NA
#> 5 animal pathogen           FALSE The Microbe Directory       NA
#> 6 animal pathogen           FALSE The Microbe Directory       NA
#>   Confidence_interval    Rank      Parent_name Parent_NCBI_ID Parent_rank
#> 1             Unknown species          Hoeflea         274591       genus
#> 2             Unknown species    Sulfobacillus          28033       genus
#> 3             Unknown species   Acidimicrobium          53634       genus
#> 4             Unknown species     Thermoplasma           2302       genus
#> 5             Unknown species    Sulfobacillus          28033       genus
#> 6             Unknown species Alicyclobacillus          29330       genus

y <- physiologies(c("gram stain", "aerophilicity"))
#> Finished gram stain
#> Finished aerophilicity
